title: challenger skins
body: Hello can  you guys help me decide which skin for me to get challenger {{champion:103}}  or challenger {{champion:76}}  pick please.

replies.body: Challenger Nidalee is the way to go Ahri has some nice skins but i dont think that one is the best.{{champion:103}}
also what skin for {{champion:103}}  do yo think is better
I think pop star or fox fire Ahri are better, but it's up to u to decide.

Personally I like [Challenger Ahri](http://www.strategyzero.com/blog/2012/league-of-legends-ahri-skins-review/) better, but she only scores a 3 while [Challenger Nidalee](http://www.strategyzero.com/blog/2013/league-of-legends-nidalee-skins-review/) scored a full 5 stars.

If you're not sure then I'd recommend going for Challenger Nidalee since it's rated so highly.
